Text: RE HiHey Steph I just got back from Italy Got a last minute assignment on the th to travel on the th and just returned on the th It was cool bc it was Italy but a longer and less busy trip would have been better How long are Nancy Michael in town Id love to meet up with yall Ive got to tell you that Ive got this person who is visiting me this weekend actually Thurssun Hes been a good friend for a long time and I like him a lot If I meet up with you guys I may bring him along if thats alright Im going to my grandparents house for Thanksgiving Going to be strange bc Todds not there and its going to be the thing that everyones thinking but now saying you know what I mean My phone s are work and home and I cant recall my cell right now We need to do dinner or predinner drinks or just skip dinner and bitch about the idiots we both work with Let me know whats up Jenn Original Message From Panus Stephanie mailtoStephanie NRONcom Sent Monday November PM To Jennifer Blume Novak Email Subject Hi Hey Jen Whats been going on What are you doing for Thanksgiving I seem to have missplaced your phone numbers Im sure if I dug through my pile of junk at home I would find them Give me a call Nancey Michael are going to be in town for Turkey Day Lots of fun going on at my office these days Stephanie Panus Senior Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale Services Smith Street EBC Houston Texas ph fax email This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use RE HiThat all sounds great to me Im going out tonight and wont be back in until late most likely so I cant call tonight Ill just coordinte with Nance and Im sure that you guys will be talking If we dont do something Friday then lets defintely do something next weekend If you do go out of town have a great time And have a good holiday Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday November AM To NOVAK JENNIFER B JSCSF Subject RE Hi That sounds like fun We might be out of town for the weekend Raymonds friend has some land about halfway between Dallas and Houston We were thinking of going up Thurs night or Fri morning If we do go out of town we need to get together next weekend Give me a call Well be around tonight Original Message From NOVAK JENNIFER B JSCSF NASA ENRON Sent Tuesday
